channel.title: Unnamed Empire
channel.description:
Making this topic unless Frell still wants to own the area. It seems rather empty and I'm willing to take over. I've done some major renovation so far. I still have to finish some of the projects that was left unfinished.
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/k0gign.jpg[/img]

item.title: Unnamed Empire
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:

PM’d you MITB.

Read full topic

item.title: Unnamed Empire
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If one of you can show me on the world map where this place is, maybe over PM if you want it to be secret, then I’ll travel there in my free time and create one.

Read full topic

item.title: Unnamed Empire
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:395263”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=492449.msg3600906#msg3600906 date=1305552164]
Will begin an outline for the topic and start mining cobblestone to finish the wall when I get home.
[/quote]

In case you are interested, I came up with a bigger (like 4x3x7 vs 4x3x2) but much improved version of a cobblestone generator, it’s many times faster than the other one, and you can even mine AFK by pointing your mouse a certain way then setting something on the button to hold it down. (incidentally, that’s how I got all the cobble for my giant castle)[/quote]

mopar wanna show me the design so i can make myself one?

Read full topic

item.title: Unnamed Empire
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:7, topic:395263”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=492449.msg3600906#msg3600906 date=1305552164]
This’ll help me see which houses I need to mark up as free space.
[/quote]

What do you mean by that?[/quote]

As in placing signs that they are properties which can be taken.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:395263”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=492449.msg3600906#msg3600906 date=1305552164]
Will begin an outline for the topic and start mining cobblestone to finish the wall when I get home.
[/quote]

In case you are interested, I came up with a bigger (like 4x3x7 vs 4x3x2) but much improved version of a cobblestone generator, it’s many times faster than the other one, and you can even mine AFK by pointing your mouse a certain way then setting something on the button to hold it down. (incidentally, that’s how I got all the cobble for my giant castle)[/quote]

I think that would be a great addition to the city! If you have time, go ahead and make it.

Read full topic

item.title: Unnamed Empire
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I wouldn’t mind building one for you guys, I don’t know how to explain it or draw it out though…

(you just need 2 buckets of lava and 2 buckets of water, then some various blocks to make the structure, I generally use cobble)

Read full topic

Will begin an outline for the topic and start mining cobblestone to finish the wall when I get home.

In case you are interested, I came up with a bigger (like 4x3x7 vs 4x3x2) but much improved version of a cobblestone generator, it’s many times faster than the other one, and you can even mine AFK by pointing your mouse a certain way then setting something on the button to hold it down. item.title: Unnamed Empire
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Thanks for the replies @ Badger & xyrz. This’ll help me see which houses I need to mark up as free space. Still waiting on Frell for an answer (if he ever comes to this part of the site), it seems he’s become uninterested and stopped coming to the site.

Will begin an outline for the topic and start mining cobblestone to finish the wall when I get home.

Read full topic

item.title: Unnamed Empire
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

badger41:

not sure if xryz still lives there but i still live there

ya i still live there. idk if im going to continue to pursue the huge monster spawner/grinder. i havent done the full calculations but its going to take tons and tons of cobblestone. if i decide not to built it which im leaning towards then u can use the cobblestone on the wall or some other project.

i may stay there as long as the server is up or i may move out to set up my own city/empire idk yet.

Read full topic
